dataTemplate.name: BCO_TRAN_IDS_BY_SALES_ORD_NO
dataTemplate.description: BCO Tran IDs by Sales Order Number

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, s.shipment_xid shipment_id, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, ssu.tag_3 tran_id, ssu.tag_2 tran_id_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight,3), '999,999,990.000')) tran_id_weight, ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code weight_uom FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON oob.order_base_gid = ssul.order_base_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :ORDER_BASE_ID ORDER BY TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY') DESC
